title: A second, but more perfect relation of the great victory obtained by Sir Ralph Hopton neare Bodmin, in the county of Cornwall, on thursday Ian. 19. ann. Dom. 1642. Together with his no lesse eminent successe at Saltash, the Sunday following being the 22th.
author: Heylyn, Peter, 1600-1662.
publisher: Printed by H. Hall for VV. VVebb,
